product_name: UVIQ Maxi UV Convertible Cover-Up - Women's
long_description: Offering unbeatable protection from UV rays, the Uviq Maxi UV Convertible Cover-Up also delivers sleek, versatile style. Wear it as a cape, scarf or poncho to stay cool but covered under sunny skies. Nylon/spandex fabric blend is lightweight, breathable and soft against skin; fabric features UPF 50+ sun protection, blocking 97.5% of all UVA/UVB rays. 10 snaps can be fastened or left undone depending on the style.
short_description: Offering unbeatable protection from UV rays, the Uviq Maxi UV Convertible Cover-Up also delivers sleek, versatile style. Wear it as a cape, scarf or poncho to stay cool but covered under sunny skies.
